巆字的基本解释

巆
yíng
〔岭（
l妌g ）巆〕见“岭2”。

巆
hōng
古同“訇”，象声词，形容巨大的声响：“砾磥磥而相摩兮，巆震天之礚礚。”

巆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hōng］
［《集韻》呼宏切，平耕，曉。］
象声词。
[②]［róng］
［《集韻》乎萌切，平耕，匣。］
见“峥巆”。
[③]［yíng］
［《集韻》玄扃切，平青，匣。］
见“岭巆”。

巆字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巆； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页322第19
【集韻】呼宏切，音營。岭巆，山深貌。【揚雄·甘泉賦】岭巆嶙峋。【註】岭巆，深邃貌。　又【宋玉·高唐賦】礫碨磥而相摩兮，巆震天之礚礚。【註】巆礚，皆石相摩之聲。　又【集韻】呼萌切，音橫。崢巆，山峻貌。◎按《集韻》嵤、巆、峵、??同。《韻會》嵤載靑韻，巆載庚韻，分爲二。今从之。

巆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
巆字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
巆
yíng
〔ridge(
l 妌g) 巆] See "Ling 2".
巆
hōng
In ancient times, "Xun", an onomatopoeia, describes a huge sound: "The graves are stubborn, but they are in contact with each other, shaking the sky."
巆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hōng］
["Ji Yun" Hu Hongqie, flat farming, dawn. ]
Onomatopoeia.
[②]［róng］
["Ji Yun" is almost cute, flat plowing, box. ]
See "Zhengxian".
[③]［yíng］
["Ji Yun" Xuan Xuan cut, flat green, box. ]
See "Lingxian".
巆
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji] [Mountain Character Department] 　巆; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 322 Page 19
[Jiyun] Hu Hongqie, Yinying. The mountains are deep and the mountains are deep. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】The ridge is rugged. [Note] Lingxian, profound appearance.　[Song Yu·Gao Tang Fu] The slabs and slabs are smashed together, shaking the sky. [Note] The sound of Shixiangmo.　[Jiyun] Hu Meng cut, sound horizontal. The majestic mountains are magnificent. ◎ The same as "Jiyun" 嵤, 巆, 峵, ??. "Yunhui" contains 靑靑靑靑靑靆巆, and is divided into two. From now on.
